data.name: Future Slash
data.description: This isn't just a theme. It is the future of Dueling Nexus. Please test this beta and provide any feedback that you can by DMing #Yubelious!#5584 on Discord. If you have any issues figuring out how to test this CSS, please ask in #extensions-support on the official forum.

data.name: Remove Youtube premium section
data.description: a simple style that removes the item "youtube premium" in menu that rolls up when you click on your avatar in the upper right corner of the youtube screen.

data.name: Hattrick Night Theme
Xenforo invisible text persistent revealer
data.description: Reveals invisible text on hovering, and the text remains revealed (for at least 3 mn, maybe permanently, I'm not sure). (based on Xenforo Invisitext Handler by subsider35 with some modifications by me.)

data.name: Crying Cause Kokichi Might Be Dead So I Made This
data.description: Need more kokichi in your life? I got u cause i do too. I'm not obsessed you are! Thx for using if u do. have a great day with kokichi background!
